Detailed Description

Exception class Command Not Allowed (error code = EIDMW_ERR_CMD_NOT_ALLOWED).

Throw when the command asked is not allowed Used in : - BEID_SmartCard::writeFile(const char *fileID,const BEID_ByteArray &out,BEID_Pin *pin,const char *csPinCode)
